# GitHub Actions Workflows

This directory contains the GitHub Actions workflow definitions.

For detailed documentation about the workflows, see [docs/workflows.md](../../docs/workflows.md).

## Workflow Files

- `build.yml` - Continuous Integration workflow
- `release.yml` - Release workflow
- `GHCR_SETUP.md` - Setup instructions for GitHub Container Registry
- `WORKFLOW_TESTING.md` - Local testing guide for workflows
- `test-workflows.sh` - Script to validate workflows locally
